statements: DELETE FROM market_data WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND price = 150.25;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE volume > 1000 AND timestamp < '2021-10-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM pricing_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM volatility_data WHERE date < '2021-09-01' AND stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
DELETE FROM historical_pricing WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_risk_analysis WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND risk_category = 'High';
DELETE FROM historical_pricing WHERE security_id = 100 AND trade_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM volatility_data WHERE volatility > 0.5 AND volatility_date > '2022-03-15';
